mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (user_id, file_name, file_url, file_type, file_size, upload_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{fileName}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{uploadTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, file_name, file_url, file_type, file_size, upload_time FROM file WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
